snippet: Justice Ruth Bader Ginsberg said on Thursday that it “would not take a large adjustment” for the country if the Supreme Court ruled that same-sex marriage is a constitutional right.
abstract: Justice Ruth Bader Ginsberg said on Thursday that it “would not take a large adjustment” for the country if the Supreme Court ruled that same-sex marriage is a constitutional right.

headline.main: Ginsburg Says U.S. Is Largely Ready for Gay Marriage

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
